borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p style="">The proposed two-storey side extension, by reason of its scale, siting and design&nbsp;would result in overshadowing impacts&nbsp;and a&nbsp;harmful loss of daylight and to no.11 Elstow Road, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:</p><div><ul><li>Paragraph&nbsp;130(f) of the&nbsp;<span pt="" sans="">National Planning Policy Framework </span>DLUHC, July 2023);</li><li>Policy D6&nbsp;of the London Plan (March 2021);</li><li><span pt="" sans="">Policy CP3 of </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);</li><li><span pt="" sans="">Policies BP8 and BP11 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011); and</li><li class="MsoNormal"><span pt="" sans="" style="">Policies DMD1 and DMD6 of </span>The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li></ul></div>

<p style="">The proposed two-storey side extension, by reason of its position, scale, massing, and design, would&nbsp;fail to be a subordinate addition to the host dwellinghouse and&nbsp;it&nbsp;would erode the&nbsp;openness&nbsp;on the&nbsp;concern&nbsp;junction&nbsp;between&nbsp;Romsey Road and Elstow Road&nbsp;negatively impacting on&nbsp;the special character and appearance of the Becontree Estate which is non-designated heritage asset.&nbsp;As such, the proposed development is contrary to:</p><ul><li>Paragraphs 134 and 203 of the National Planning Policy Framework (DLUHC, July 2023);</li><li>Policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (March 2021);</li><li>Policies CP2 and CP3 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);</li><li>Policies BP2 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011);</li><li>Policies SP2, DMD1, DMD4 and DMD6 of The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)The Residential Extensions; and</li><li>Paragraphs 5.4.1&nbsp;and&nbsp;5.4.2&nbsp;of the&nbsp;Residential Extensions and Alterations&nbsp;Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)</li></ul>
description: Construction of a two storey side extension and the enlargement of the front porch
